WHEN 10-YEAR-OLD BEN TENNYSON DISCOVERS A MYSTERIOUS WATCH, HE GAINS THE ABILITY TO TRANSFORM INTO 10 DIFFERENT ALIENS, EACH WITH THEIR OWN AWESOME POWER. BEN REALISES THAT HE MUST USE THESE POWERS TO HELP OTHERS AND STOP EVILDOERS, BUT THAT DOESN'T MEAN HE'S ABOVE A LITTLE SUPER POWERED MISCHIEF NOW AND THEN.
HE’S SUPER STRONG, TOTALLY FIRE AND LASER PROOF AND CAN JUMP REALLY HIGH! FOUR ARMS CREATES SHOCKWAVES BY CLAPPING ALL FOUR HANDS TOGETHER AND USES HIS POWERFUL PUNCHES TO SOLVE ANY PROBLEMS!

THE BIG GUY! THIS AWESOME ALIEN IS RESISTANT TO ACIDS AND LAVA! HE CAN EVEN DEFLECT LASERS WITH HIS PLATING TO PROTECT HIMSELF. CANNONBOLT ROLLS UP INTO A HUGE MOTORISED WHEEL TO KNOCK DOWN HIS ENEMIES AT SUPER SPEEDS!

DIAMONDHEAD CAN TRANSFORM HIS BODY INTO DIAMOND WEAPONS SUCH AS BLADES AND BLUDGEONS. HE CAN ALSO FIRE LETHAL CRYSTAL SHARDS FROM HIS HANDS AND RESIST ATTACKS WITH HIS STURDY CRYSTAL CHEST. GUESS DIAMONDS REALLY ARE THE HARDEST SUBSTANCE IN THE UNIVERSE!

SMALL IN STATURE, HUGE IN INTELLECT: THIS SLIMY ALIEN IS STRONGER THAN HE LOOKS! GREY MATTER HAS SHARP TEETH TO ATTACK HIS ENEMIES AND TAKES ADVANTAGE OF HIS COMPACT SIZE TO FIT JUST ABOUT ANYWHERE, PROVING THAT SOMETIMES BRAINS REALLY DO BEAT BRAWN!

THE MASTER OF ALL THINGS SCORCHIO! HEATBLAST CAN GENERATE INTENSE HEAT AND FIRE AND USES FLAMING PUNCHES TO DEFEAT HIS ENEMIES. HEATBLAST’S FAVOURITE ATTACK IS SHOOTING BALLS OF FIRE FROM HIS HANDS TO SET HIS ENEMIES ABLAZE!

THIS AQUATIC ALIEN CAN BREATHE UNDERWATER, SHOOT HIGH-POWERED AQUA BLASTS AND BOASTS HEAVY ARMOUR TO DEFEAT HIS ENEMIES! OVERFLOW CAN PROPEL HIMSELF HIGH INTO THE AIR AND EVEN TRANSFORM HIS WATER JETS INTO BLADES TO CUT HIS ENEMIES DOWN TO SIZE.

PEE-YEW! THIS FLYING INSECT IS THE SMELLIEST ALIEN OF ALL ! STINKFLY IS QUICK AND AGILE, BUT DON’T BE FOOLED, HE’S NOT JUST SPEEDY! HE HAS A SHARP STINGER ON HIS TAIL AND CAN SHOOT STREAMS OF GROSS FLUID THAT CHOKE AND BLIND HIS ENEMY. GROSS AND DEADLY!

THIS FUTURISTIC ALIEN USES NANOTECHNOLOGY TO ENHANCE DEVICES HE COMES INTO CONTACT WITH. BUT THAT’S NOT THE ONLY TRICK UP HIS SLEEVE: UPGRADE CAN ALSO MORPH INTO A LIQUID STATE TO GET HIMSELF OUT OF ANY STICKY SITUATION!

THIS WEIRD AND WONDERFUL ALIEN CAN TRANSFORM INTO PLANT MATTER TO CAMOUFLAGE HIMSELF. HE ALSO PRODUCES POWERFUL VINES FROM HIS LONG LIMBS TO USE AS TRANSPORTATION OR AS WEAPONS! NOTHING CAN STOP THE MIGHTY VINE!

THE FASTEST ALIEN OF THEM ALL! XLR8 CAN REACT AT SUPERHUMAN SPEEDS TO THINK OF A MILLION COMBINATIONS IN SECONDS TO DEACTIVATE DEVICES; HE CAN ALSO RUN ON WATER AND REACH SPEEDS OF 500MPH! NO ENEMY CAN GET AWAY FROM XLR8!

ZOMBOZO REAL NAME: HERBERT J. ZOMBONI. PROFESSION: CRIMINAL MASTERMIND. HIS SCARY CLOWN APPEARANCE IS EXACTLY HOW HE SEES HIMSELF. ZOMBOZO EMPLOYS A VAST ARRAY OF CIRCUS TRICKS AND TACTICS TO AID HIS CRIMINAL SCHEMES.

HEX IS A MASTER OF MAGIC. HE IS A HIGHLY AMBITIOUS SORCERER ETERNALLY ON THE HUNT FOR MAGICAL ARTIFACTS TO AID IN HIS EVIL PURSUITS. HE'S GOT A BIT OF A TEMPER AND THE PERFECT LACK OF A SENSE OF HUMOR TO COMPLIMENT IT TERRIBLY.
Watch every Thursday on Cartoon Network!
Who has the most powerful punches?
Which alien was Ben's first ever transformation?
Which alien is able to curl up into a ball?
Which alien is made of magma?
Which alien has silicon based DNA?
Which alien can shoot a smelly liquid at enemies?
Which alien can merge with technology?
Which alien can shoot water from his arms?
